name: Watch Out
description: Watch out is intended to be an "I got to kill 5-10 minutes somehow"-game. It is an arcade racing game where your only objective is to get as high a score as possible on a random generated map.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core Dual Core Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GT 540 Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows  8.1 Processor: Intel Core Quad Core Memory: 4096 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 780 Storage: 300 MB available space
